question: Which Indian writer was given Gemcon Young Literature Award-2019?
explanation: At the ninth edition of the Dhaka Literature festival West Bengal-based writer Abhisek Sarkar and Bangladeshi poet Rofiquzzaman Rony were given the Gemcon Young Literature Award and Gemcon Young Poetry Award. Abhisek and Rofiquzzaman won the awards for their creations, “Nishiddho” and “Dhoashar Tamate Rong,” respectively.
